tool.help:
$MCPREFIX What do you want to do?
$MCPREFIX 1 = Start
$MCPREFIX 2 = Stop
$MCPREFIX 3 = Restart
$MCPREFIX 4 = Remove system
tool.remove:
$MCPREFIX Do you want to remove the system? (Server itself won't be removed)
[\033[1;32myes\033[0m|\033[0;31mno\033[0m]

mcstart.online:
$MCPREFIX Server is already online! Use:
$MCPREFIX screen -r $MCNAME to get the console.
$MCPREFIX less -r screenlog.0 to view the log.

mcstop.kill: $MCPREFIX Server hasn't reacted after 30 seconds. Kill Minecraft instance...

counter.invalid:
$MCPREFIX Counter information invalid.
$MCPREFIX Please open the port to the outside or change it.
$MCPREFIX Or disable in the config \033[1;32mcounter:\033[0;31m false\033[0;37m
